医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新生物材料可以重新定义大脑和中枢神经系统损伤的恢复一种新的电活性可移植材料可以帮助大脑和脊髓中的细胞再生，可以重新定义遭受改变生命的伤害或患有神经退行性疾病的患者的康复前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-biomaterial-could-redefine-recovery-from-brain-and-central-nervous-system-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-biomaterial-could-redefine-recovery-from-brain-and-central-nervous-system-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bbaf646-9bbd-470f-b88b-331ca66b92c1 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 07:33:00 -0500 New biomaterial could redefine recovery from brain and central nervous system injuries
分析强调老年人和男性 TBI 死亡率较高对美国死亡率数据的一项新分析揭示了创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 对老年人、男性和某些种族和族裔群体的不成比例的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Analysis-highlights-high-TBI-death-rates-among-older-adults-and-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Analysis-highlights-high-TBI-death-rates-among-older-adults-and-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45e1f8e-fce7-434f-8d5a-189224960ead Fri, 10 Jan 2025 07:24:34 -0500 Analysis highlights high TBI death rates among older adults and men
乳制品中的钙可降低结直肠癌风险这项研究揭示了钙摄入量与降低结直肠癌风险之间的密切联系，强调了影响女性癌症发病率的饮食因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Dairy-products-linked-to-lower-colorectal-cancer-risk-thanks-to-calcium.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Dairy-products-linked-to-lower-colorectal-cancer-risk-thanks-to-calcium.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87cb90d2-b3f2-4e9b-b8a1-64c7e481039c Fri, 10 Jan 2025 07:16:00 -0500 Dairy products linked to lower colorectal cancer risk, thanks to calcium
烟草使用趋势以及图形警告标签对尼古丁产品的影响约翰·霍普金斯大学彭博公共卫生学院将为媒体举办专家简报会，讨论烟草使用趋势、新的香烟包装和广告图形警告要求的影响，以及涉及尼古丁袋和电子烟等产品的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Tobacco-use-trends-and-the-impact-of-graphic-warning-labels-on-nicotine-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Tobacco-use-trends-and-the-impact-of-graphic-warning-labels-on-nicotine-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b12ff7a-bc1a-4d78-b282-09d292179ce1 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 06:58:00 -0500 Tobacco use trends and the impact of graphic warning labels on nicotine products
医疗保健人工智能本意是为了省钱，结果却需要大量昂贵的人力肿瘤科医生的工作是让癌症患者做好做出艰难决定的准备。然而，他们并不总是记得这样做。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Health-care-AI-intend-to-save-money-turns-out-to-require-a-lot-of-expective- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Health-care-AI-intended-to-save-money-turns-out-to-require-a-lot-of-expective- humans.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a740ac66-7a2d-44ee-abc1-1c69c175bfce Fri, 10 Jan 2025 06:45:56 -0500 Health care AI, intended to save money, turns out to require a lot of expensive humans
皮特康解决合成迷幻药危机；波士顿 2025 推进合作2025 年波士顿 Pittcon 将汇聚行业专家，共同应对合成迷幻剂的威胁，加强测试协议和公共卫生举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Pittcon-addresses-synthetic-psychedelics-crisis3b-Boston-2025-to-advance-collaboration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Pittcon-addresses-synthetic-psychedelics-crisis3b-Boston-2025-to-advance-collaboration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e92ad38-9319-41da-90f4-322ac4ed1556 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 05:08:00 -0500 Pittcon addresses synthetic psychedelics crisis; Boston 2025 to advance collaboration
接骨木浆果汁有望促进肠道健康和对抗肥胖富含花青素的接骨木果汁可促进葡萄糖调节和脂肪代谢，对超重成年人的肠道微生物群有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Elderberry-juice-shows-promise-in-boosting-gut-health-and-combating-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Elderberry-juice-shows-promise-in-boosting-gut-health-and-combating-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8361a0cc-8f68-46aa-ae8f-84999ab073b9 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 04:44:00 -0500 Elderberry juice shows promise in boosting gut health and combating obesity
性别特异性线粒体标记物缺陷与阿尔茨海默病早期认知功能障碍有关研究表明，患有认知障碍的女性存在性别特异性的游离肉碱缺乏症，这将线粒体代谢与阿尔茨海默病的进展联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Sex-specific-mitochondrial-marker-deficicies-linked-to-early-cognitive-dysfunction-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Sex-specific-mitochondrial-marker-deficiency-linked-to-early-cognitive-dysfunction-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dad369b3-25f2-4e1b-b399-4d377fbde2c8 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 03:59:00 -0500 Sex-specific mitochondrial marker deficiencies linked to early cognitive dysfunction in Alzheimer’s disease
RNAConnect 推出新型 UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR 试剂盒，以提高基因表达分析的可靠性UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR 试剂盒为基因表达研究提供无与伦比的数据可靠性和灵敏度，简化工作流程并保持 RNA 完整性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNAConnect-Debuts-The-New-UltraMarathonRTc2ae-RT-qPCR-Kit-to-Improve-Reliability-Of-Gene-Expression-Analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/RNAConnect-Debuts-The-New-UltraMarathonRTc2ae-RT-qPCR-Kit-to-Improve-Reliability-Of-Gene-Expression-Analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1aa06df6-4a97-4da8-a939-e6fde4bd6676 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 02:30:00 -0500 RNAConnect Debuts The New UltraMarathonRT® RT-qPCR Kit to Improve Reliability Of Gene Expression Analysis
较小的力导致对齐的胶原纤维上的细胞运动更快在机械生物学中，细胞力被认为是其增强功能（包括快速迁移）的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Lower-force-leads-to-faster-cell-movement-on-aligned-collagen-fibres.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Lower-force-leads-to-faster-cell-movement-on-aligned-collagen-fibres.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2021aa0e-936b-41d2-814b-26fa1f0c981c Fri, 10 Jan 2025 01:24:19 -0500 Lower force leads to faster cell movement on aligned collagen fibers
